seo.title: Cinque Terre 2025 - UNESCO Heritage Guide | Five Villages Italy
seo.description: Discover Cinque Terre's five colorful villages on the Italian Riviera. Complete 2025 guide to hiking trails, beaches, accommodation, and authentic Ligurian experiences.

body.title: Discover Cinque Terre
body.subtitle: Five stunning villages perched on dramatic cliffs along the Ligurian coast, connected by scenic hiking trails and crystal-clear Mediterranean waters

features.title: Monterosso al Mare
features.description: The largest village with beautiful sandy beaches, historic churches, and vibrant promenade perfect for seaside relaxation

features.title: Vernazza
features.description: A charming fishing village with a natural harbor, medieval castle, and colorful houses creating the most photographed vista

features.title: Corniglia
features.description: The only village not directly on the sea, perched 100m high on a cliff with stunning panoramic views and authentic atmosphere

features.title: Manarola
features.description: Famous for its dramatic cliffside setting, sweet Sciacchetr√† wine, and breathtaking sunset views over the harbor

features.title: Riomaggiore
features.description: The southernmost village with steep streets, colorful tower houses, and the legendary Via dell'Amore coastal path

features.title: Ligurian Cuisine
features.description: Authentic pesto, fresh seafood, local wines, and traditional trattorias offering unforgettable Mediterranean flavors

body.title: Start Planning Your Cinque Terre Adventure
body.description: Explore detailed guides for hiking, dining, accommodation, and local experiences
